Recoil.name: Recoil
Recoil.effect: When a Thought or Group engages you and does not break a Focus Counter, remove it from play.

Remembrance.name: Remembrance
Remembrance.effect: When you lose a Focus Counter, you may search your Discard for a card and add it to your hand.

Sacrifice Recall.name: Sacrifice Recall
Sacrifice Recall.effect: When a turn ends you may play any number of Thoughts from your discard pile that where removed this turn and immediatly destroy one of your own Focus Counters.

Overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
Overwhelm.effect: Increase the total Power of your own Groups by 10.

Awareness.name: Awareness
Awareness.effect: Increase the hand size of all Thinkers by 2.
